nodes.text: The Bar Neth system was a quinary star system located in the Albarrio sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Bar Neth. By the year 4.3 ABY, the Star Tours travel agency facilitated transit to the system through its Frontier Vacation Package.
The Bar Neth system was established in The Essential Atlas Online Companion, which placed the system in grid square K-5.
